thread.title: BRIEF-Monitise says Visa Europe to reduce stake in co
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Monitise says Visa Europe to reduce stake in co | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Monitise says Visa Europe to reduce stake in co
text:
July 8 Monitise Plc :
* Has been notified by Visa Europe Ltd ("Visa Europe") that it will reduce its shareholding over time
* Visa Europe currently holds 115,750,000 shares, which represents 5.3 percent of Monitise's issued share capital. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom)
